post:
Hi guys, I have the following to sell:

- HostBill Licenses - Owned, No-Branded HostBill License + Provisioning Modules - cPanel Manage2 Module License. ORIGINAL PRICE: $599.90 USD. SALE PRICE: $300 USD

- ***SOLD*** WHMCS Licenses - Owned License No Branding. ORIGINAL PRICE: $324.95 USD. SALE PRICE: $200 USD INCLUDING NEW SUPPORT AND UPDATES PACKAGE FROM DATE OF SALE.

I currently use WHMCS on our main domain, but we tested Hostbill and had another installation of WHMCS running. Both are now excess to requirements and may as well go to a good home.

EDIT: Added asking price due to possible pricing confusion.
